summary: Implements a diffusion pipeline that converts textual prompts into images using the Stable Diffusion XL model, enhanced with ControlNet conditioning and optional extensions such as LoRA, textual inversion, and IP adapters. Handles encoding, latent preparation, guidance scaling, and optional watermarking.
business_intent: Enable developers and creators to generate highâ€‘quality, controllable AI images from text for applications like content creation, advertising, design prototyping, and visual storytelling.
